Holistic Therapy

Breathe. Feel. Find yourself.

Breathwork and body-emotion support for those who want to reconnect deeply.

My Vision of Therapy

For me, therapy is a sacred space for meeting oneself. It is the exploration of the **indissociable link between the body, the breath and the emotions**. Too often, we live cut off from our physical feelings, locked in the mind.

My approach aims to restore this circulation, to let emotions express themselves through the body to find true clarity of mind and inner harmony.

Breathwork

The Power of Breath

Breathwork is a conscious and connected breathing technique that allows access to light altered states of consciousness. It is a powerful tool to release tensions stored in the body, soothe the nervous system and unblock crystallized emotions. By breathing, we bypass the mind to go directly to meet what vibrates within us, offering a direct path to liberation and transformation.

Holistic Support

My support does not stop at the breath. It integrates the totality of your being. Together, we explore your thought patterns, your emotional blockages and how they are inscribed in your body.

It is a tailor-made journey, where each session is a step towards a better knowledge of yourself and greater autonomy in your process of healing and fulfillment.

Ice Bath

The Cold that Awakens

Ice water immersion is a powerful catalyst for vitality. It strengthens the immune system, improves circulation and offers a unique space to tame your mind through breath.

My Posture & My Role

Presence & Listening

I stand by your side with a full and entire presence. My role is not to 'fix' you, but to create the safe space necessary for your own inner wisdom to express itself.

Radical Benevolence

Without judgment, I welcome everything that presents itself. Every emotion, every cry or every silence has its place and importance in your journey.

Mirror & Guide

I serve as a mirror to your inner processes, guiding you through the zones of shadow to help you find your own light and your power to act.

Engagement

My commitment is total in each session, putting all my tools and all my human experience at the service of your transformation.
